did.abstract: This collection consists of the TUC Archives on Microfiche

defitem.label: Contact Information:
defitem.item: Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives Martin P. Catherwood Library 227 Ives Hall Cornell University Ithaca, NY 14853 (607) 255-3183kheel_center@cornell.eduhttp://www.ilr.cornell.edu/library/kheel

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Access to the collections in the Kheel Center is restricted. Please contact a reference archivist for access to these materials.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: This collection must be used in keeping with the Kheel Center Information Sheet and Procedures for Document Use.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: TUC Archives on Microfiche, #6115 fiche. Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library.

relatedmaterial.head: Related Materials
relatedmaterial.p: Related collections: 6112mf: TUC Periodicals and Serials on Microfilm 6113mf: TUC General Committee Minutes and Papers on Microfilm 6114mf: TUC Archives on The Mining Crisis and The Genral Strike on Microfilm
